title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2846/95 of 7 December 1995 repealing Regulation (EC) No 1788/95 concerning the stopping of fishing for whiting by vessels flying the flag of France
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2846/95 of 7 December 1995 repealing Regulation (EC) No 1788/95  concerning the stopping of fishing for whiting by vessels flying the flag of France
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 December 1995.
For the Commission Emma BONINO Member of the Commission
